Description: Thank you for your interest in our glasses All eyeglasses are for the FRAME ONLY!!!!!!! * All available sizing information will be listed in the title. How to determine your size: The best way to determine what size frame you need is to check the inside arms on your current frames. On the side arm (temple arm) you will find three numbers (for example: 51-17-135). The first is the lens width, the second is the bridge width, and the third is the temple length. All measurements are in millimeters. You may also find this information on the nose, bridge, or inner edge of the eyepiece. Our Guarantee: We are not here to waste your time or your resources. We guarantee you will be satisfied with your purchase. If you are dissatisfied for any reason, please contact us and we will make things right. Feedback: If you feel any part of your transaction was less than satisfactory, please contact us before leaving negative feedback. We value your business and we want to ensure you are completely satisfied. Authenticity and Condition: All items we sell are 100% authentic. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us before purchase. We closely examine each pair of frames prior to sale. Please view all photos before purchase. We try to show the frame from all angles to remain as transparent as possible. Shipping: All orders are shipped through USPS with tracking. The tracking number will automatically upload into eBay when shipped. We guarantee all items will ship within 2 business days. We only ship to PayPal verified addresses. No exceptions. International orders will be shipped within 2 business days; however, please allow additional time for delivery. Each listing title will end with a series of 4 letters/numbers. Please disregard as this is for internal use only.
